description: Represents a streaming session machine image that can be used to launch a streaming session

KeyArn.description: The ARN for a KMS key that is used to encrypt studio data.
KeyArn.markdownDescription:
The ARN for a KMS key that is used to encrypt studio data.

--- Required: No Type: String Minimum Length: 4 Pattern: ^arn:.* Update requires: No interruption

Owner.description: The owner of the streaming image, either the studioId that contains the streaming image, or 'amazon' for images that are provided by Amazon Nimble Studio.
